snippet.title: Studies look to sea for cystic fibrosis treatment
snippet.description:
* Surfers chasing waves off the coast of Australia gave researchers a clue to a cheap, effective treatment for cystic fibrosis.
http://www.cnn.com/2006/HEALTH/conditions/01/18/cf.saltwater/index.html

snippet.title: Potential new approach to cystic fibrosis treatment reported
snippet.description:
* SEATTLE CNN Researchers have discovered that high doses of a specific fatty acid can reduce symptoms of cystic fibrosis in mice a finding that potentially could lead to a treatment for a disease that is now incurable in humans.
http://www.cnn.com/HEALTH/9910/09/cystic.fibrosis/index.html

snippet.title: Rx for those bankrupted by medical crisis
snippet.description:
* When 3-year-old Finnegan Burns fell ill with complications from cystic fibrosis, his parents did what any loving parents would do. Kerry and Patrick Burns put their lives on hold to see their son through his medical travails.
http://www.cnn.com/2009/OPINION/12/15/edwards.whitehouse.medically.bankrupt/index.html
